title: Gripper target
description: Gripper target, one of target or opening is required

target.description: Target of active joints in the gripper

safety.title: Gripper safety parameters
safety.description: Parameters to prevent over-torques on position-controlled grippers

iter.description: Maximum number of iterations spent above "threshold" before the gripper is release by "release"

threshold.description: Encoder-command difference [degrees] over which the gripper is considered in overtorque

release.description: Number of degrees by which the gripper should be released when safety is triggered
